Name: Apocalyptic Adventure: Episode 1
About the game: A unique twist on survival by combining action, adventure, and strategy in virtual reality. Apocalyptic Adventure is a game where players must manage resources, plan defenses, and explore to survive. Episodes will challenge the player to overcome hordes of enemies using the environment to their advantage. Specifically crafted for room-scale and teleportation. Episode 1 includes all the game's core mechanics listed below. Key Features: Defense: Planning and strategizing a defense is crucial to surviving. Barricade yourself in and place traps as the last line of defense between you and the enemy. Crafting: As you scavenge through the apocalyptic world you will acquire unique items. These items can be crafted together to create weapons, tools, traps, and more. Combat: Combat choices include firearms, melee weapons, throwing explosives, and traps. Be aware, with limited resources you will resort to anything around you to get the job done! Adventure: Each episode is set in a unique location. The first is a mountainous region centered around a water mill. The only way to survive is to figure out how to get off the mountain. Movement: Designed specifically for room scale and teleportation for a comfortable game experience.
